user_prompt:
Task: Mission: Go to the blue pillar, turn right, then stop next to the table.

Based on the current image, choose the next action to complete this task. Use absolute directions (up/down/left/right).
vlm_reasoning: 1. Last action result check: No previous action, so no failure to consider. 2. Task completion check: The robot is not yet at the blue pillar. 3. Action feasibility: Moving up is feasible as the path is clear. 4. Loop prevention check: No previous actions to loop. 5. Grounding rule: None applicable.
memory_spatial_description: The robot is at the bottom left corner. The blue pillar is directly above the robot. The table is to the left of the blue pillar.
